The Related Discourses

14. Mindfulness of Breathing (cf. SN 54: Ānāpāna Saṃyutta)

The Mindfulness of Breathing group consists of 15 full sutras and 7 abbreviated variants for a total of 22. The material is found in fascicle 29 of Taisho No. 99. Below is a list of the English translations currently available.

Note: Previous English translations currently available at SuttaCentral are referenced below. The reader should be aware that titles for SA sutras are supplied by the translator(s). The sutra numbering follows Yinshun’s reconstruction. The Taisho sutra numbers are noted for reference ("[T 99.xxx]").

  • 1. Qualities Supporting Mindfulness of Breathing (Pierquet) [T 99.801]
  • 3. Cultivating Mindfulness of Breathing (Patton) [T 99.803]
  • 17. Attaining Four, Seven, and Two Things (Patton) [T 99.810]
